subject: French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: As darkness fell on Roland Garros, the sun also set on Andy Roddick’s longest run at the French Open with a 6-4, 6-2, 6-3 loss to Gael Monfils of France in the fourth round.
snippet: As darkness fell on Roland Garros, the sun also set on Andy Roddick’s longest run at the French Open with a 6-4, 6-2, 6-3 loss to Gael Monfils of France in the fourth round.
